personalInfo.clubAffl: The Woodlands CC (The Woodlands, Texas); Morgan Creek GC (South Surrey, British Columbia, Canada)

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Finished T137 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Played in 12 events on the Adams Pro Tour, made 10 cuts and recorded seven top-10s. 

2014: PGA TOUR Canada veteran closed with rounds of 67-64 to finish T5 at the inaugural Forces and Families Open in sixth start of 2014, three strokes behind champion Greg Machtaler...Represented Canada with Peter Campbell at the inaugural Bridgestone America's Golf Cup, going on to finish in a tie for 27th.

 2013: Competed on PGA TOUR Canada...Made eight starts, making four cuts...Had four top-25s, with his best finish a T4 in Times Colonist Island, finishing 40th on the Order of Merit...Played on the Adams Tour, winning twice (Merrill Lynch Open and Kohls Open).
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won three college titles while at the University of Louisiana-Lafayette and had 17 top-10 finishes.
tourBios.personal: Attended Langley Secondary school in Langley, British Columbia, Canada...Favorite golf memory is playing St. Andrews and Carnoustie in Scotland in the same day...If not a professional golfer, would be in real estate...Biggest thrill in golf was seeing the University of Louisiana-Lafayette win its conference title via playoff in 2007 at Disney World...Biggest thrill outside golf is jetboating on the Niagara River rapids...Favorite courses are Squire Creek and Northview Ridge Course...Would like to play Cypress Point...Favorite college teams is the University of Louisiana-Lafayette Ragin Cajuns...Favorite pro teams are the Vancouver Canucks and New Orleans Saints...Favorite website is barstoolsports.com...Favorite TV shows are "Seinfeld," "Homeland" and "24."...Favorite movie is "Snatch."...Favorite musical group is the Dave Matthews Band...Favorite athlete is Ryan Kesler of the Vancouver Canucks...Favorite vacation spot is Wailea, Hawaii...Person he would trade places with for a day is "anyone playing Cypress Point because I want to play it"...Dream foursome would include his dad, Miguel Angel Jimenez and Moe Norman...Not many people know he is distantly related to the actor Jim Carrey...Bucket list includes the Canucks winning the Stanley Cup...First-tee intro song would be "Pursuit of Happiness" by Steve Aoki...Twitter name is @devincarrey.

tourBios.carHigh: 2013: Made four cuts in eight starts on PGA TOUR Canada, highlighted by a career-best T4 finish at the Times Colonist Island Savings Open. Won twice on the Adams Tour. 2012: Made four cuts in eight starts on PGA TOUR Canada, with a season-best T14 finish at the Syncrude Boreal Open. 2011: Made six cuts in eight starts, including a string of five top-30 finishes in a row. 2010: Made seven cuts in nine starts on PGA TOUR Canada with a season-best T7 finish at the TOUR Championship. 2009: Fired rounds of 74-69-70-68--281 to finish T10 at the 2009 Fall Qualifying School, earning exempt status for 2010.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Individual selection for NCAA Division 1 Regionals. Winner of three collegiate tournaments. Finished inside the top 10 in college events 20 times. Finished T19 at the 2008 Canadian Amateur and made it to the round 32 in 2007. Finished T21 at the 2007 British Columbia Amateur and was 18th in 2008...Finished eighth at the 2004 British Columbia Amateur. Winner of seven Maple Leaf Junior Tour events in three seasons and was three-time member of Team Canada for the Maple Leaf Junior Tour.
tourBios.personal: Attended Langley Secondary school in Langley, British Columbia, Canada...Favorite golf memory is playing St. Andrews and Carnoustie in Scotland in the same day...If not a professional golfer, would be in real estate...Biggest thrill in golf was seeing the University of Louisiana-Lafayette win its conference title via playoff in 2007 at Disney World...Biggest thrill outside golf is jetboating on the Niagara River rapids...Favorite courses are Squire Creek and Northview Ridge Course...Would like to play Cypress Point...Favorite college team is the University of Louisiana-Lafayette Ragin Cajuns...Favorite pro teams are the Vancouver Canucks and New Orleans Saints...Favorite website is barstoolsports.com...Favorite TV shows are "Seinfeld," "Homeland" and "24."...Favorite movie is "Snatch."...Favorite musical group is the Dave Matthews Band...Favorite athlete is Ryan Kesler of the Vancouver Canucks...Favorite vacation spot is Wailea, Hawaii...Person he would trade places with for a day is "anyone playing Cypress Point because I want to play it."...Dream foursome would include his dad, Miguel Angel Jimenez and Moe Norman...Not many people know he is distantly related to the actor Jim Carrey...Bucket list includes the Canucks winning the Stanley Cup...First-tee intro song would be "Pursuit of Happiness" by Steve Aoki...Twitter name is @devincarrey.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T68th in 2014 at the Nova Scotia Open.
